item.title: CVE-2022-45048|2024-10-15T18:12:43.127Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: Authenticated users with appropriate privileges can create policies having expressions that can exploit code execution vulnerability.Â This issue affects Apache Ranger: 2.3.0. Users are recommended to update to version 2.4.0.
